thread.title: Buckley: Routs are fine, but Patriots must protect Tom Brady
thread.title_full: Buckley: Routs are fine, but Patriots must protect Tom Brady | Boston Herald

author: Steve Buckley
title: Buckley: Routs are fine, but Patriots must protect Tom Brady
text:
Did anyone around here think we’d ever again be engaging in a running-it-up debate?
Not me, and for one simple reason: In order for National Football League teams to even consider the possibility of running up the score, they must possess a history-making blend of talent, depth, consistency, cohesiveness, teamwork . . . the list just goes on and on.
